channel.title: GCOG Countdown Plus Gauntlet Con Dates
channel.description: **GCOG COUNTDOWN PLUS GAUNTLET CON DATES** We're just four days away from GCOG. If you see a game you want to play, please sign up. Share links to the event on social media! ***Also we have chosen the dates for Gauntlet Con this year: October 15th-18th.*** Right now we have a ton of games fully filled, but we still have seats in the following events: *Black Code* *Fanfriction* *Getting to Philosophy* *Gully-Toads: Fever Swamp* *Legends of Avallen: Celtic-Roman RPG* *Monster of the Week* *Paris Gondo- The Life Saving Magic of Inventorying* *Pasión de las Pasiones* *Prince Valiant* *Swords of the Serpentine* *Tales from the Loop* *The Mustang* *Traverser* *Trophy Dark* *Trophy Gold* *Unincorporated* *World of Blades* *World Wide Tuk Tuk Tournament* https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info

item.title: GCOG Countdown Plus Gauntlet Con Dates
item.dc:creator: @edige23
item.description:
@edige23 wrote:

GCOG COUNTDOWN PLUS GAUNTLET CON DATES
We’re just four days away from GCOG. If you see a game you want to play, please sign up. Share links to the event on social media! Also we have chosen the dates for Gauntlet Con this year: October 15th-18th. Right now we have a ton of games fully filled, but we still have seats in the following events:
Black Code
Fanfriction
Getting to Philosophy
Gully-Toads: Fever Swamp
Legends of Avallen: Celtic-Roman RPG
Monster of the Week
Paris Gondo- The Life Saving Magic of Inventorying
Pasión de las Pasiones
Prince Valiant
Swords of the Serpentine
Tales from the Loop
The Mustang
Traverser
Trophy Dark
Trophy Gold
Unincorporated
World of Blades
World Wide Tuk Tuk Tournament
https://gauntlet-con.firebaseapp.com/all-events-info
